title: Stepped copper sites coupling voltage-induced surfactant assembly to achieve efficient CO2 electroreduction to formate
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02697G, Paper
Sicong Qiao, Guikai Zhang, Dong Tian, Wenjie Xu, Wei Jiang, Yuyang Cao, Jun Qian, Jing Zhang, Qun He, Li Song
The electrochemical reduction of carbon dioxide (CO2) into formate holds great promise. However, the ongoing competition of parallel reactions, including the generation of hydrogen (H2), carbon monoxide (CO), and multi-carbon...
